text: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen is a 2003 dieselpunk superhero movie based on the book by Alan Moore. It is the last movie to feature Sean Connery before his retirement in 2006 and death in 2020. ==Cast== * Sean Connery as Allan Quartermain * Shane West as Tom Sawyer * Richard Roxburgh as The Fantom / M / Professor James Moriarty ==Production== Sean Connery had a rough time being a part of the movie and he started to retire after it was released. title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen (movie)
